entry.title: RT Tesla: Sentry Mode enables your Tesla to monitor & record potential threats while parked
entry.summary:
RT Tesla Sentry Mode enables your Tesla to monitor & record potential threats while parked
Zack: Sentry Mode on my Model Y just saved us from having its wheels stolen this morning. Time and time again sentry mode proves to be a priceless asset to owning a @Tesla. Thank you Tesla for this technology, just saved me a ton of money and headache, scared the thief away. @elonmusk https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1667648464279437312 https://t.co/sHahFvrcb1
